channel.title: The government will take care of us!
channel.description:
http://www.theblaze.com/stories/watch-out-parents-the-state-may-want-to-take-away-your-obese-kids/
hypothetical, but i sure do hope we start using the intelligent minds god gave us, and throw obama and his stupid care plan out of the window - 2012 awaits (that is if he doesn't turn our country into a dictatorship first)!

item.title: The government will take care of us!
item.dc:creator: @Tu1 Tu
item.description:
@Tu1 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:6, topic:404456”][quote author=Tu link=topic=501497.msg3669157#msg3669157 date=1310793059]

This will never pass as a real law as it is unjust because being fat is considered a life style choice, just like smoking. I don’t really get how you are trying to connect this to dictatorship.

you’ve made an extremely ironic post.
[/quote]
That’s not an ironic post that’s how the United States laws state obesity as, they consider it a life style choice because it is mainly based on self control just like smoking.[/quote]
yes it was… and don’t worry about it. you obviously don’t understand this article. i suggest reading it.

Read full topic
item.source: The government will take care of us!

item.title: The government will take care of us!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

the elve age:

Dictatorship?

Yeah I didn’t get that either lol.

Read full topic

item.title: The government will take care of us!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Thank god I live in Canada.

gravenfire23:

The term obese is used too loosely, some people cant help it and its not there parents faults.

Most people forget that Obesity can be medically induced (When you’re an infant if you have issues). Also, some peoples baby fat sticks around longer than others.

Read full topic
